devdoc.details: Contract module which provides functionality to freeze assets on contract and get allocation.

params.amountETHMin: Min ETH amount desiered while adding liquidity
params.amountOutMin: The minimum amount of output tokens while swaping
params.amountTokenMin: Min token amount desiered while adding liquidity
params.deadline_: Timestamp after which the transaction will revert.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.multiplier_: Shows how many times the power will be greater for  user while staking with LP

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

multiplier.details: Multiplier to colculate power while freezing with LP

totalPower.details: The data for each account, returns totalPower

devdoc.title: SweetpadFreezing

freezeWithBNB(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Transfer BNB to contract and Freeze LP

setMultiplier(uint256).notice: Set multiplier to calculate power while freezing with LP
